Class EntitiesConfigurationBuilder

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class EntitiesConfigurationBuilder
extends AbstractAttributesAndViewsBuilder<EntitiesConfigurationBuilder,MutableEntityConfiguration<?>>
    Central builder for customizing configuration entries in the EntityRegistry.
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme

      • view

        public ViewBuilder view(String name)
        Description copied from class: AbstractAttributesAndViewsBuilder
        Returns a AbstractSimpleEntityViewBuilder instance for the view with the given name. If there is already another builder type for that view, an exception will be thrown.
        Specified by:
        view in class AbstractAttributesAndViewsBuilder<EntitiesConfigurationBuilder,MutableEntityConfiguration<?>>

      • apply

        public void apply(MutableEntityRegistry entityRegistry,
                  org.springframework.beans.factory.config.AutowireCapableBeanFactory beanFactory)
        Apply the builder configuration to the EntityRegistry. This will not invoke the post processors, use postProcess(com.foreach.across.modules.entity.registry.MutableEntityRegistry) to execute the post processors after the configuration has been applied.
        Parameters:
        entityRegistry - EntityRegistry to which the configuration should be applied.
        beanFactory - The BeanFactory that should be used to create beans like ViewFactory instances.

      • postProcess

        public void postProcess(MutableEntityRegistry entityRegistry)
        Apply the post processors to the registry. Post processors are applied one after the other to the entire registry (instead of one after the other per entity configuration). First the global post processors are applied, followed by the individual EntityConfigurationBuilder post processors.

        If a PostProcessor returns a different instance than the one passed in as parameter, the new instance will replace the new one in the registry even if it would defer in entity type. If the post processor returns null, the entity configuration will be removed.

        Parameters:
        entityRegistry - EntityRegistry to which the post processors should be applied.
